## Key Insights

- **Endless Mode Implementation**: Significant progress on Endless Mode (Issue #109) with compression capabilities added across multiple components (capabilities, tasks, repositories).
- **Architecture Discoveries**: Multiple observations of the worker capabilities system architecture, confirming its decoupled design between abstract capabilities and provider implementations.
- **Repository Pattern Expansion**: New `IArchivedOutputRepository` interface added to support archiving functionality, extending the existing repository pattern.
- **Task System Enhancement**: New `CompressionTask` type introduced to handle ~95% token reduction for archived outputs.
- **Type System Growth**: Multiple new types added (CompressionStatus, ArchivedOutputRecord) and metrics configuration types introduced for Issue #258.
